game_description: Showtime VR enables remote management of many VR headsets. The solution includes a 360 player which is installed on the headset and is able to play 360 and 180 degrees videos (2D and 3D) and 360 graphics and photos (panoramas) up to 8192x4096px as a slideshow. The controller application is installed on a tablet or PC/Mac. The content can be played synchronically on all headsets or asynchronically. Showtime VR is designed for business professional presentations, marketing campaigns activations, movie shows - VR theatre solution, kiosk solutions â€“ little involvement of staff, fair presentations, events - everywhere where you need to have full control over the headsets and the content presented on them, where you have to manage remotely the VR headsets and would like to present the VR content in synchronic way. The 360 Showtime VR player works only with Showtime VR controller application.
review_1: Looking forward to test the full capacity of this one. Very helpful tool! The manual could indeed be clearer, but I feel confident that the developers will take care of that soon.
review_2: Supports all current movie standards, including ambisonic and aubtitles!
review_3: no way to put videos in the library
